data.comment: Today's referee, Bjorn Kuipers, has blown to start the match.
Zian Flemming scores to make it 1-0 at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
In the minute 9, Mats Seuntjens with an assist there.
Goal! Dani De Wit levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Albert Gudmundsson to set up the goal.
In the minute 37, Pantelis Chatzidiakos is booked for the away team.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 52, Teun Koopmeiners puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Albert Gudmundsson instrumental with a fine assist.
Yukinari Sugawara is replacing Albert Gudmundsson for the away team.
In the minute 69, Goal! Myron Boadu extends Alkmaar's lead to 1-3.
Dani De Wit with an assist there.
Alkmaar make their second substitution with Tijani Reijnders replacing Pantelis Chatzidiakos.
In the minute 74, Emil Hansson is on a sub for Lisandro Semedo for Sittard.
The home team replace Sebastian Polter with Bassala Sambou.
Kevin Hofland (Sittard) is making a third substitution, with Martin Angha replacing Branislav Ninaj.
In the minute 79, Goal! Emil Hansson pulls one back for Sittard to make it 2-3.
Sittard make their fourth substitution with Djibril Dianessy replacing George Cox.
Ramon Leeuwin is on a sub for Zakaria Aboukhlal for Alkmaar.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Myron Boadu with Ferdy Druijf. This is the third substitution made today by Arne Slot.
Sittard's Lazaros Rota has been booked in Sittard-Geleen.
The match has come to a close in Sittard-Geleen. The final score is 3-3.
At Fortuna Sittard Stadion, Jorrit Smeets has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Zian Flemming is on target to level the scores at 3-3.
